name: Consume Arm
description:
We are in 2084. The world is controlled by Multinational.

Amazon'n is the most powerful company and controlled lot of country. 

Everyone know it's possible to give back an object who they bought on Amazon'n on 15 days for be refunded. The consumers bought lot of object and refunded it for few days. But what nobody knows it's the fact of Amazon'n destroy all of this object.

The game takes place on one of the warehouse of Amazon'n where they destroyed the refund object.

The players controlled an arms and have to destroy the objects but some objects are trapped or some of the employees fall on the conveyor belt.

The input of the game is very simple, you just have to click on the left mouse button, this button action the arm for destroy the box. The player have to make attention to the trapped boxes and the employees. When a box come to the "destroy zone" the player have to push the button for destroy them.

For won the player have to survive 20 second.
